statements: SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT id, label FROM training_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM training_data WHERE label = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM training_data;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, label FROM training_data WHERE label = 1 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM training_data WHERE label = 0 AND user_id = 10
SELECT id, product_id, label FROM training_data WHERE user_id = 5 OR product_id = 3
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label IN (0, 1)
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label = 1;
SELECT feature1, feature2 FROM training_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, label FROM training_data WHERE feature1 < 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM metadata WHERE source = 'A' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, source, timestamp FROM metadata ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label = 1 ORDER BY feature1 DESC, feature2 ASC;
SELECT id, feature1 FROM training_data WHERE feature1 > 0.5 AND label = 0;
SELECT MAX(feature1), MIN(feature2) FROM training_data;
SELECT * FROM metadata WHERE source = 'example_source' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM training_data WHERE label = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT feature1, feature2 FROM training_data;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_id, source_data FROM source1;
SELECT source_data FROM source2 WHERE source_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE feature1 > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT feature1, feature2 FROM training_data WHERE feature2 < 0.3 ORDER BY feature1 ASC;
SELECT td.id, s1.source_data FROM training_data AS td JOIN source1 AS s1 ON td.id = s1.source_id;
SELECT td.id, s2.source_data FROM training_data AS td JOIN source2 AS s2 ON td.id = s2.source_id WHERE td.feature1 < 0.2;
SELECT AVG(feature1), MAX(feature2) FROM training_data;
SELECT * FROM training_data_sources;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type FROM training_data_sources;
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM training_model WHERE model_type = 'Classification';

SELECT data_source_name, model_name, performance_metric FROM training_data_sources JOIN data_source_mapping ON training_data_sources.id = data_source_mapping.data_source_id JOIN training_model ON data_source_mapping.model_id = training_model.model_id;
SELECT DISTINCT model_id, performance_score FROM model_performance WHERE performance_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM training_data_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM training_model WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type FROM training_data_sources WHERE data_source_type LIKE '%data%' LIMIT 5;

SELECT model_id, model_name, model_type, performance_metric, performance_score FROM training_model JOIN model_performance ON training_model.model_id = model_performance.model_id WHERE training_model.model_type = 'Classification' AND model_performance.performance_score > 80;

SELECT * FROM data_source_mapping JOIN training_data_sources ON data_source_mapping.data_source_id = training_data_sources.id JOIN training_model ON data_source_mapping.model_id = training_model.model_id ORDER BY training_model.model_id ASC, data_source_mapping.mapping_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT user_id, user_features FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM user_details WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT source_name FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'external';
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT user_id, user_features FROM training_data WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT id, source_name FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'API' ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT id, prediction_result, prediction_confidence FROM model_predictions WHERE prediction_confidence > 0.8
